newInstance

public SCM newInstance(org.kohsuke.stapler.StaplerRequest req)
Description copied from class: Descriptor
Creates a configured instance from the submitted form.

Hudson only invokes this method when the user wants an instance of T. So there's no need to check that in the implementation.

Specified by:
newInstance in class Descriptor<SCM>
Parameters:
req - Always non-null. This object includes all the submitted form values.
